Review_body:
overall the quality music is awesome never had such experience in other headphones
I would recommend buying this,

CONS:
1. The Bluetooth is not so strong to hear a song in a terrace, audio breaks like anything
in a closed room, u won't find anything like a break-in the signal
2. The aux cable is totally not lengthy not suitable for PUBG like games Bluetooth audio is slow for games
and aux is not fitted properly and it's not a dependent one

PROS:
1. good audio, awesome everything to hear and noise cancellation is really good
Review_head: NOT THE BEST BLUETOOTH MODE HEADPHONE

Review_body:
1. Anything you listen, even at 50% volume, is audible to people in other room as well. They should be categorized as mini speakers rather than headphones
2. Aux cable provided in the box is too short for using with laptop/computer
3. Even with music playing, we can hear everything (zero noise cancellation)

Worst product and note that there is no refund for this item => you end up with same piece again!

Noise cancellation doesn't work in this product, I tried to return but policy is not allowing me to return and get my refund . hence putting this feedback. I am not happy with such product and quality , I will not recommend this product for official purpose.  Please don't buy and stuck like me .ThanksUmesh Sharma
Review_head: Quality is not good , NO noise cancellation feature working , Very heavy .

Review_body:
I have heard many headphones, but i choose very wisely.

I love this over the ear headphones with a theatre kind of feeling with noise cancellation.

Also one more good good thing is, it comes up with wire if incase battery of bluetooth is not available.

They also call once for support and feedback which i think no headphone company does.
Review_head: Great and value for money product.

Review_body:
Battery Backup:
10/10

10/10

9.5/10

9.5/10
Comfort:
9.5/10
Packaging was very good. Light weight & Battery backup is commendable. I use it for 4 - 5 hrs continuously, but battery reduction was minimal.
Very good audio quality with passive noise cancellation. Microphone is also very effective with clear sound. Worth every penny. Just go for it. you'll love it.
Overall, best value for money !!

I am Boult audio thunder user and I am fully satisfied by this product. The notice cancellation is good but then too you can hear loud noises of vehicles. The sound quality is better. The battery life for bluetooth connection is best because If it is fully charged then it can work for almost one day but I the battery gets over then you can continue using it with the help of cord which we get free with it and the cord is also of comfortable length. One thing I didn't liked is that it is sensitive if you hit the speakers then it looses the sound from that side but it automatically gets recovered in one day.
Review_head: Best and satisfying product in low rate.

Review_body: The best quality product in affordable price, the audio quality is awesome and uninterrupted bluetooth connectivity.. best battery life...Noise cancellation is good.

This is a very good headphones with good noise cancellation I recommend you to buy this better than JBL and BoatIf you are searching for good quality headphones in cheap price definitely for youWith next level sound bass if you want to check the bass go on YouTube and search 8d music and play it will 🤯 your head

Ordered this 2 weeks ago and fully charged on Day 1. Since then i haven't charged it yet and still the battery is 10% left. It easily runs for 10 days on a single charge.

Complete noise cancellation ensures you only listen to high quality music.

Would highly recommend this product.
***** 5 star

Amazing product for best price, best noise cancellation, super bass, long lasting battery life. Since I bought the product I've not charged it for 5 days as it came for full 5 days without any problem. I've really enjoyed buying this BOULT AUDIO PROBASS THUNDER.
Review_head: Best product and super satisfied buying this.

After use of Boult audio pro bass thunder, I had better experience in terms of noise cancellation and sound quality. Battery performance also good. Once charged it took more than 1 day to discharge after continuation usage. I will strongly recommend to buy.

Amazing product, good design and fits larger faces. Noise cancellation is good. I watched two movies in one charge. Sound Quality is good. I am able to attend calls and meetings. It is a good work from home accessory.

The bass of the head phone is superb .and the battery life is 9 -10 hours it is a long battery life.  The noise cancellation is awesome.  Overall it is a fantastic headphone .after using it for three days one of the ear cup has got loosen
Review_head: I recommend to buy this earphone

Review_body: The over the head headphones are pretty good for bass lovers. Noise cancellation is very impressive. Battery backup is about 12hrs while watching movies. All is good about this product. Anyone can buy without any hesitation
